--- title: "" include-after-body: text: | --- :::::: {.scenario .column-screen} :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} ## The Giggle Gumdrop Adventure :::: ::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ![](images/giggle-gumdrop-adventure.png) ::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} Hannah and Meghan couldn't resist the charm of the Giggle Gumdrops, and with a cheerful nod, they tried a handful each. As soon as they tasted the magical treats, their giggles echoed through the market, and the sisters began to float in the air, surrounded by a group of flying gingerbread cookies. Giggling and floating, Hannah and Meghan reached the end of the market where they saw two intriguing paths. Straight ahead, a candy cane bridge led to a mysterious forest. To the left, a jingle bell path twinkled with festive lights. :::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ::: {style="text-align: center;"} ### What will you choose? ::: ```{=html}
Go back
The candy cane bridge
The jingle bell path
``` :::: ::::::
